description: This chapter describes Jonah's disobedience to God's command, his flight to Tarshish, the great storm at sea, and his being swallowed by a great fish.

questions.question: Who was Jonah the son of?
Whose word came unto Jonah?
Where did the LORD tell Jonah to go?
What did the LORD tell Jonah to do in Nineveh?
What had come up before the LORD regarding Nineveh?
Where did Jonah flee to?
options: Tarshish from the presence of the LORD
Jerusalem from the presence of the LORD
Samaria from the presence of the LORD
Damascus from the presence of the LORD

questions.question: Where did Jonah go down to find a ship?
What did Jonah do before going down into the ship?
Where did the LORD send out a great wind?
What was there in the sea?
What was the ship like?
What did the mariners do?
options: Were afraid, and cried every man unto his god

questions.question: What did the mariners cast forth to lighten the ship?
options: The wares that were in the ship into the sea

questions.question: Where had Jonah gone down?
options: Into the sides of the ship
Into the top of the ship
Into the middle of the ship
Into the front of the ship

questions.question: What was Jonah doing?
What did the shipmaster say to Jonah?
What did the shipmaster tell Jonah to do?
Why did the shipmaster tell Jonah to call upon his God?
options: If so be that God will think upon us, that we perish not

questions.question: What did they do to know for whose cause the evil was upon them?
Whose lot fell upon?
What did they ask Jonah to tell them?
options: For whose cause this evil is upon us

questions.question: What questions did they ask Jonah?
options: What is thine occupation? and whence comest thou? what is thy country? and of what people art thou?

questions.question: What did Jonah say he was?
Whom did Jonah say he feared?
options: The LORD, the God of heaven, which hath made the sea and the dry land

questions.question: Why were the men exceedingly afraid?
options: Because he had told them that he fled from the presence of the LORD

questions.question: What did the men ask Jonah?
What did they ask Jonah when the sea wrought and was tempestuous?
options: What shall we do unto thee, that the sea may be calm unto us?

questions.question: What did Jonah tell them to do?
options: Take me up, and cast me forth into the sea

questions.question: When did Jonah say the sea would be calm unto them?
options: So shall the sea be calm unto you

questions.question: What did Jonah say he knew?
options: I know that for my sake this great tempest is upon you

questions.question: What did the mariners do to bring the ship to land?
options: Rowed hard to bring it to the land

questions.question: Why could the mariners not bring the ship to the land?
options: For the sea wrought, and was tempestuous against them

questions.question: Whom did the mariners cry unto?
What did the mariners beseech the LORD?
options: Let us not perish for this man's life

questions.question: Where did the mariners ask not to lay innocent blood?
options: Lay not upon us innocent blood

questions.question: What did the mariners do to Jonah?
options: Took up Jonah, and cast him forth into the sea

questions.question: What happened when the mariners cast Jonah into the sea?
options: The sea ceased from her raging

questions.question: Whom did the mariners fear exceedingly?
What did the mariners do unto the LORD?
options: Offered a sacrifice unto the LORD, and made vows
